name: Sync Patent Writer and User - Add
script:
# 自动为提交的 Patent Writer 添加 User Permission
# doc.name 是 Patent Writer 记录的 name（即 writer_id，如 "WRT-John_Doe-001"）

user = frappe.db.get_value('User',
    {'email': doc.email, 'enabled': 1}, 'name')

if user:
    if not frappe.db.exists('User Permission', {
        'user': user, 'allow': 'Patent Writer', 'for_value': doc.name
    }):
        perm = frappe.get_doc({
            'doctype': 'User Permission',
            'user': user,
            'allow': 'Patent Writer',
            'for_value': doc.name,
            'is_default': 1
        })
        perm.insert(ignore_permissions=True)
        frappe.msgprint(f"✅ 已移添加户 {user} 对 Patent Writer '{doc.name}' 的访问权限", alert=True)

name: Sync Patent Writer and User - Del
